welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santiago del Estero, where you'll find a perfect blend of colonial charm and modern vibrancy. Known as the oldest city in Argentina, we invite you to explore its rich history, vibrant cultural scene, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay!
